entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Rain mixed with wet snow beginning in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia late in the evening and overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
